select waybill_id, order_id, waybill_code, create_time, finish_time from speedlogisticsdb.t_waybill limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into speedlogisticsdb.t_waybill(order_id, waybill_code, create_time, finish_time) values (#{orderId}, #{waybillCode}, #{createTime}, #{finishTime})

order_id = #{orderId},

SELECT count(1) FROM `t_waybill` w,`t_order` o,`t_customer` c WHERE w.`order_id` = o.`order_id` AND o.`customer_id` = c.`customer_id`
AND w.`waybill_code` LIKE CONCAT(#{waybillCode},'%')
AND c.`wx_name` LIKE CONCAT(#{wxName},'%')
AND c.`real_name` LIKE CONCAT(#{realName},'%')

SELECT c.`wx_name` wxName,c.`real_name` realName,w.`waybill_code` waybillCode, w.`waybill_id` waybillId,w.`create_time` createTime,w.`finish_time` finishTime FROM `t_waybill` w,`t_order` o,`t_customer` c WHERE w.`order_id` = o.`order_id` AND o.`customer_id` = c.`customer_id`
AND w.`waybill_code` LIKE CONCAT(#{condition.waybillCode},'%')
AND c.`wx_name` LIKE CONCAT(#{condition.wxName},'%')
AND c.`real_name` LIKE CONCAT(#{condition.realName},'%')
LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

SELECT w.`waybill_code`, MAX(CASE a.`type` WHEN '0' THEN CONCAT(a.`address_city`,' ',a.`address`,' ',a.`owner_name`,' ',a.`phone`) ELSE NULL END) send_address, MAX(CASE a.`type` WHEN '1' THEN CONCAT(a.`address_city`,' ',a.`address`,' ',a.`owner_name`,' ',a.`phone`) ELSE NULL END) receive_address,w.`create_time` createTime FROM `t_waybill` w,`t_order` o,`t_address` a WHERE w.`order_id` = o.`order_id` AND (o.`sender_address_id` = a.`address_id` OR o.`receive_address_id` = a.`address_id`) AND w.`waybill_id` = #{waybillId} GROUP BY w.`waybill_code`

SELECT w.waybill_id,w.waybill_code,w.create_time, MAX(CASE a.type WHEN 0 THEN a.owner_name ELSE NULL END) senderName, MAX(CASE a.type WHEN 1 THEN a.owner_name ELSE NULL END) receiverName FROM t_waybill w JOIN t_order o ON o.order_id = w.order_id JOIN t_address a ON a.address_id = o.sender_address_id OR a.address_id = o.receive_address_id WHERE w.dot_id = #{dotId} AND o.state = 1

SELECT o.order_id,w.waybill_code,o.weight,s.res_sort AS sortName, MAX(CASE a.type WHEN 0 THEN CONCAT(a.owner_name,' ',a.phone) ELSE NULL END) sender, MAX(CASE a.type WHEN 1 THEN CONCAT(a.owner_name,' ',a.phone) ELSE NULL END) receiver, MAX(CASE a.type WHEN 0 THEN CONCAT(a.province ,a.city,a.area,a.address) ELSE NULL END) sendAddress, MAX(CASE a.type WHEN 1 THEN CONCAT(a.province ,a.city,a.area,a.address) ELSE NULL END) receiveAddress FROM t_waybill w JOIN t_order o ON o.order_id = w.order_id JOIN t_address a ON a.address_id = o.sender_address_id OR a.address_id = o.receive_address_id JOIN t_res_sort s ON s.res_sort_id = o.res_sort_id WHERE w.waybill_id = #{waybillId}
